events.message: I recently ordered a jacket from your store, but it doesn't fit at all and I'd like to request a refund since the item cannot be exchanged.
The issue has been classified under ‘Refund’ due to the customer requesting money back for an ill-fitting product.
The case has been assigned to Agent Sarah T. for further handling of the refund request.
Hello! Thank you for contacting us. I’m here to help with your refund request for the jacket you ordered.
Could you please provide the order number and confirm if the jacket has been worn or damaged in any way?
Sure, the order number is 123456789. The jacket is brand new, I tried it on once but did not damage it.
Thank you for the information. I have initiated the refund process. You will receive confirmation and the refund within 5-7 business days.
Thanks for the quick response! I appreciate your help with the refund and will watch for the confirmation email.
The refund has been successfully processed and the case is now resolved. Please contact us if you need further assistance.
Just checking in to confirm you received your refund. Please let us know if everything is satisfactory or if you need more help.
We are closing this case now as the refund has been issued and no further issues were reported by the customer.
We have sent a satisfaction survey to your email. Your feedback is valuable to us and helps improve our service.
